sentences.sContent: After months of hard work, our plans finally came to fruition .
sentences.sContent_eng: After months of hard work, our plans finally came to fruition .
sentences.sCn: 经过几个月的艰苦工作，我们的计划终于完成了。

sentences.sContent: The essentials of the reward system in science are "peer recognition" of scientists fruition of originality.
sentences.sContent_eng: The essentials of the reward system in science are "peer recognition" of scientists fruition of originality.
sentences.sCn: 科学奖励的实质是对科学家独创性成就的“同行承认”。

sentences.sContent: You'll learn whether or not you enjoy the work as well as improve your professional record for seeing things to fruition.
sentences.sContent_eng: You'll learn whether or not you enjoy the work as well as improve your professional record for seeing things to fruition.
sentences.sCn: 你不仅可以知道自己是否喜欢这份工作，也可以因为完成任务而提高你的职业记录。

remMethod.val: fruit(水果) + ion → 有果实， 有成果 → 实现， 完成

words.tran: 富有成效的；多产的；果实结得多的
不成功的，徒劳的；不结果实的
圆润的；有果味的；果实状的
果实；结果实；[食品] 水果；成果

trans.tranOther: if a plan, project etc comes to fruition, it is successfully put into action and completed, often after a long process
